name: thick-fat

effect.sun_moon: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.

short_effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
